ValidationRule.description: Only users with the integration profile can move an opportunity from Pending Client Feedback. Collections Leads and CDev Sups should be able to move to any stage.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Profile.Name = 'System Administrator'), ISCHANGED( Sub_Stage__c ), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE( Sub_Stage__c ),'Pending Client Feedback') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The sub-stage cannot be moved from Pending Client Feedback manually.
